023package org.opt4j.optimizers.de;
024
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Map.Entry;
031import java.util.Random;
032
033import org.opt4j.core.Genotype;
034import org.opt4j.core.Individual;
035import org.opt4j.core.IndividualFactory;
036import org.opt4j.core.common.random.Rand;
037import org.opt4j.core.genotype.DoubleGenotype;
038import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IncompatibilityException;
039import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IndividualCompleter;
040import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer;
041import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.Population;
042import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.TerminationException;
043import org.opt4j.core.start.Constant;
044import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Add;
045import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Algebra;
046import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Index;
047import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Mult;
048import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Sub;
049import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Term;
050import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Var;
051import org.opt4j.operators.crossover.Crossover;
052import org.opt4j.operators.crossover.Pair;
053import org.opt4j.optimizers.ea.Selector;
054
055import com.google.inject.Inject;
056
057/**
058 * The {@link DifferentialEvolution}.
059 * 
060 * @author lukasiewycz
061 * 
062 */
063public class DifferentialEvolution implements IterativeOptimizer {
064
065        protected final double scalingFactor;
066
067        protected final int alpha;
068
069        protected final Algebra<Genotype> algebra;
070
071        protected final Crossover<Genotype> crossover;
072
073        protected final Selector selector;
074
075        protected final Random random;
076
077        private final IndividualFactory individualFactory;
078
079        private final Population population;
080
081        private final IndividualCompleter completer;
082
083        private Term term;
084
085        /**
086         * Constructs a {@link DifferentialEvolution}.
087         * 
088         * @param population
089         *            the population
090         * @param individualFactory
091         *            the individual factory
092         * @param completer
093         *            the completer
094         * @param algebra
095         *            the algebra operator
096         * @param selector
097         *            the selector
098         * @param random
099         *            the random number generator
100         * @param crossover
101         *            the crossover operator
102         * @param alpha
103         *            the population size
104         * @param scalingFactor
105         *            the scaling factor F
106         */
107        @Inject
108        public DifferentialEvolution(Population population, IndividualFactory individualFactory,
109                        IndividualCompleter completer, Algebra<Genotype> algebra, Selector selector, Rand random,
110                        Crossover<Genotype> crossover,
111                        @Constant(value = "alpha", namespace = DifferentialEvolution.class) int alpha,
112                        @Constant(value = "scalingFactor", namespace = DifferentialEvolution.class) double scalingFactor) {
113                this.algebra = algebra;
114                this.selector = selector;
115                this.random = random;
116                this.crossover = crossover;
117                this.alpha = alpha;
118                this.scalingFactor = scalingFactor;
119                this.individualFactory = individualFactory;
120                this.population = population;
121                this.completer = completer;
122        }
123
124        /*
125         * (non-Javadoc)
126         * 
127         * @see org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer#initialize()
128         */
129        @Override
130        public void initialize() {
131                Index i0 = new Index(0);
132                Index i1 = new Index(1);
133                Index i2 = new Index(2);
134                Var c = new Var(scalingFactor);
135                term = new Add(i0, new Mult(c, new Sub(i1, i2)));
136                selector.init(2 * alpha);
137        }
138
139        /*
140         * (non-Javadoc)
141         * 
142         * @see org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer#next()
143         */
144        @Override
145        public void next() throws TerminationException {
146                if (population.isEmpty()) {
147                        firstIterationNext();
148                } else {
149                        followingIterationsNext();
150                }
151        }
152
153        private void firstIterationNext() {
154                while (population.size() < alpha) {
155                        Individual individual = individualFactory.create();
156
157                        Genotype genotype = individual.getGenotype();
158                        if (!(genotype instanceof DoubleGenotype)) {
159                                throw new IncompatibilityException("DifferentialEvolution is restricted to " + DoubleGenotype.class
160                                                + ", current Genotype is: " + genotype.getClass());
161                        }
162
163                        population.add(individual);
164                }
165        }
166
167        private void followingIterationsNext() throws TerminationException {
168                /*
169                 * Map from each parent to its offspring
170                 */
171                Map<Individual, Individual> relation = new HashMap<>();
172
173                /*
174                 * Create an offspring for each parent individual in the population and
175                 * add the offspring to the population and evaluate their objectives
176                 */
177                List<Individual> list = new ArrayList<>(population);
178                for (Individual parent : population) {
179                        Individual offspring = createOffspring(parent, list, term);
180                        relation.put(parent, offspring);
181                }
182                population.addAll(relation.values());
183                completer.complete(population);
184
185                /*
186                 * Remove those offspring individuals from the population that are
187                 * dominated by their corresponding parent
188                 */
189                for (Entry<Individual, Individual> entry : relation.entrySet()) {
190                        Individual parent = entry.getKey();
191                        Individual offspring = entry.getValue();
192
193                        if (parent.getObjectives().weaklyDominates(offspring.getObjectives())) {
194                                population.remove(offspring);
195                        }
196                }
197
198                /*
199                 * Truncate the population size to alpha
200                 */
201                Collection<Individual> lames = selector.getLames(population.size() - alpha, population);
202                population.removeAll(lames);
203        }
204
205        protected Individual createOffspring(Individual parent, List<Individual> individuals, Term term) {
206                Triple triple = getTriple(parent, individuals);
207
208                Genotype g0 = triple.getFirst().getGenotype();
209                Genotype g1 = triple.getSecond().getGenotype();
210                Genotype g2 = triple.getThird().getGenotype();
211
212                Genotype result = algebra.algebra(term, g0, g1, g2);
213                Pair<Genotype> g = crossover.crossover(result, parent.getGenotype());
214
215                Individual i;
216                if (random.nextBoolean()) {
217                        i = individualFactory.create(g.getFirst());
218                } else {
219                        i = individualFactory.create(g.getSecond());
220                }
221                return i;
222        }
223
224        /**
225         * The {@link Triple} is a container for three individuals.
226         * 
227         * @author lukasiewycz
228         * 
229         */
230        protected static class Triple {
231                protected final Individual first;
232
233                protected final Individual second;
234
235                protected final Individual third;
236
237                public Triple(final Individual first, final Individual second, final Individual third) {
238                        super();
239                        this.first = first;
240                        this.second = second;
241                        this.third = third;
242                }
243
244                public Individual getFirst() {
245                        return first;
246                }
247
248                public Individual getSecond() {
249                        return second;
250                }
251
252                public Individual getThird() {
253                        return third;
254                }
255        }
256
257        /**
258         * Returns three different {@link Individual}s from the {@code individuals}
259         * list. Each {@link Individual} is not equal to the parent.
260         * 
261         * @param parent
262         *            the parent Individual
263         * @param individuals
264         *            the population
265         * @return the three individuals as a Triple
266         */
267        protected Triple getTriple(Individual parent, List<Individual> individuals) {
268                individuals.remove(parent);
269                Individual ind0 = individuals.remove(random.nextInt(individuals.size()));
270                Individual ind1 = individuals.remove(random.nextInt(individuals.size()));
271                Individual ind2 = individuals.remove(random.nextInt(individuals.size()));
272
273                Triple triple = new Triple(ind0, ind1, ind2);
274
275                individuals.add(parent);
276                individuals.add(ind0);
277                individuals.add(ind1);
278                individuals.add(ind2);
279
280                return triple;
281
282        }
283
284}
